title: Darken text contrast color in landing page ICP teaser section

requirements.summary: Apply a darker, high-contrast text color to the first paragraph in the ICP teaser section (third div of the section) to ensure legibility against its background
acceptanceCriteria: The targeted paragraph text is visibly darker and clearly readable against its background.
The contrast ratio meets WCAG AA minimum (4.5:1) for normal text.
No other text elements on the page are unintentionally affected.

file_operations.description: Locate the paragraph element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[3]/div[1]/p[1] within the ICP teaser section and replace its text color class with a darker, high-contrast variant such as 'text-gray-900' (or 'text-gray-950' if available in the theme) to ensure the text meets WCAG AA contrast requirements. Do not modify layout, spacing, or font size. Only the text color class of this specific paragraph should be changed.
